channel.title: Android on Hi i'm David
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Hi i'm David

item.title: Google Maps 2017 - 2018 Summer Internship
item.description: Over the past summer (2017 - 2018) I worked on the Google Maps Location Sharing team! Location Sharing in Maps allows you to share your location with someone. Typical use cases include sharing with family members when overseas and sharing with friends to try meet up somewhere. I worked on two features to improve the user experience when sharing location by providing more information to the person being shared with, I can now talk about because they launched!
